main event: A witness sighted 3 to 4 unidentified flying objects in Brunswick, Maine, on December 23, 1966.
interesting points: The objects appeared to change in size from small to about 3-4 inches in diameter,The sighting lasted approximately 1.5 minutes,The objects had a steady glow and followed an irregular course ranging from about 5 degrees to 90 degrees,They ascended and descended during the sighting, The witness was a 17-year-old civilian employed in a shoe factory.
witness description: Civilian, 17 years old, employed in packing department of a shoe factory, sounded reliable.
